about_the_game:
The original music from I Wani Hug That Gator.
Composed largely by Melo Anon.

Tracks included:
01. Final First Page (Main Menu)
02. Green Specter (Olivia Theme)
03. I Wanna Know What I Wanna Do (Inco Theme)
04. Teenage Traffic (School Theme)
05. Hallowed Halls (School Theme 2)
06. Inco and Olivia (Romance 1)
07. Rollin' Along (Happy Theme)
08. This Class Sucks!!!!! (Boring Theme)
09. Edge (Foreboding-Tense Theme)
10. My Dilemma (Somber Ambience)
11. Oh Miss Halford (Somber Theme)
12. Nightwalk (Introspective Night)
13. Pale Morning (Anxious Ambience)
14. Furious March of Red (Intense Theme)
15. Mural de Melanoma
16. Muddy Wheelchair
17. PurbleStank
18. Honestly that was warranted, that was glitter
19. One Last Favor
20. Gold Feather
21. I Know You'll Be Fine
22. I Hate School!!!!! (It Makes Me Sad) (Somber School)
23. Afternoon Before A Big Night (Thoughts-Thinking)
24. Her Dress (Dress Reveal)
25. Jingle Bells But Awesome
26. Dino on the Dance Floor (Prom 1)
27. The Swagger (Prom 2)
28. Stratospheric (Prom 3)
29. StegoStarry Night
30. Bataria Del Fuego Act I
31. Bataria Del Fuego Act II
32. See Us Run
33. Empty Classroom
34. Worthwhile Words
35. Closest (Credits C)
36. Je suis un Homme (Credits B)
37. Stairway Drones
38. She Sleeps (Hospital Drones)
39. Later, Gator (Credits A)
40. The Night's Not Done
41. I Dream of a Dance
42. Reflecting On The Outer World (Introspective 1)
43. Reflecting On The Outer World (I'm Reflecting Harder) (Introspective 2)
44. Tonight (Romance 2)
45. Friends and Family (Credits D)
46. Right Pocket (Epilogue)
47. Signatures (Complete Menu)
48. I Wanna Hug that Gator!
49. I Wanna Hug that Gator! (Short Ver.)
50. I Wanna Hug that Gator! (Instrumental)
